fact_check_explanation_title: Claim that immigrants “only” pay £400 surcharge to use the NHS ignores their tax contributions
fact_check_explanation_summary: At the moment, the immigration health surcharge is £400 for non-EEA immigrants to the UK, but their tax payments also contribute to the running of things like the NHS.

fact_check_explanation_title: Labour draws unsubstantiated link between dental costs and hospital admissions
fact_check_explanation_summary: Labour’s claim is also partially based on data which is a decade old.

fact_check_explanation_title: This is a photo from Tony Benn’s funeral
fact_check_explanation_summary: Gerry Adams, Martin McGuinness and Jeremy Corbyn were both attendees of theLabour MP’s funeral in 2014.

fact_check_explanation_title: A&E waiting times have hit their worst levels on record
fact_check_explanation_summary: 83.6% of patients attending A&E departments in England were admitted, transferred or discharged within four hours. That’s the lowest level on record, going back to 2010.

fact_check_explanation_title: Conservative claim about immigration under Labour is not credible
fact_check_explanation_summary: It’s not credible to put a specific number of the effect of a policy when no one knows exactly what the policy is.

fact_check_explanation_title: Scottish government uses non-official data on youth unemployment
fact_check_explanation_summary: That data shows Scottish youth unemployment has fallen. But official data shows it has increased in Scotland over the last year.

fact_check_explanation_title: We don’t know if there’s a north/south divide in flood defence spending because the data was taken offline
fact_check_explanation_summary: Figures from the Environment Agency that could have helped shed light seem to have been taken offline.

fact_check_explanation_title: The USA doesn’t “allow” maggots in orange juice—it sets levels at which enforcement is mandatory
fact_check_explanation_summary: The US sets levels of natural contaminants in food above which it takes immediate enforcement action. The EU doesn’t set such levels.

fact_check_explanation_title: Claim that Brexit will cost every Scot £1,600 is not right
fact_check_explanation_summary: These claims give the impression individuals would lose money, when it’s actually a prediction of how much less the GDP would be in a decade’s time compared to remaining.

fact_check_explanation_title: How sophisticated was the “sophisticated” cyber attack against Labour?
fact_check_explanation_summary: A DDoS attack by itself is not a sophisticated or particularly novel website attack.

fact_check_explanation_title: Another flawed “cost of Corbyn” figure from the Conservatives
fact_check_explanation_summary: You can’t work out the cost of a manifesto which hasn’t been published yet. And it’s flawed to assume all income tax payers have the same tax burden.

fact_check_explanation_title: There are serious problems with the Conservatives’ claim that Labour would spend £1.2 trillion
fact_check_explanation_summary: You can’t work out the cost of a manifesto that hasn’t been published yet.
